comment.author: 10771167@N00
comment._content: Grace Finlay McPherson was born 26 May 1897 in Brooklyn, NY. In 1919, when she applied for her passport, she had recently married Chauncey Ryder McPherson. Chauncey would later become a vice president and director of ITT and Grace would become the president of the New Jersey Society of the Colonial Dames of America. In 1919, after her marriage, Grace applied for a passport to tour South America. Her passport photo is here.
